CSS3 Fallback to Decimal List Style

This tests that we fallback to the decimal list style type when the ordinal is outside the representable range for the list style type as per the CSS3 Counter Styles Level 3 module (CR 3 Februari 2015). This test PASSED if the list item matches its marker for every list item (below).

Note, as of 02/05/2021, syriac is unsupported and hence have expected failure results.

Algorithmic

armenian

  1. -1
  2. 0
  3. Ա
  1. Ք̂Ջ̂Ղ̂Թ̂ՔՋՂԹ
  2. 100000000

cjk-ideographic

  1. 負一
  2. 零
  3. 一

ethiopic-numeric

  1. -1
  2. 0
  3. ፩

georgian

  1. -1
  2. 0
  3. ა
  1. ჵჰშჟთ
  2. 20000
  3. 20001

hebrew

  1. -1
  2. אפס
  3. א
  1. תתקצט׳תתקצט
  2. 1000000
  3. 1000001

japanese-formal

  1. マイナス壱
  2. 零
  3. 壱

japanese-informal

  1. マイナス一
  2. 〇
  3. 一

  2. 0

  2. 100000000
